mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices (title, content, userid, createddate, category) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userid}, NOW(), #{category});
mapper.select: SELECT noticeid, title, userid, createddate FROM notices WHERE category = 'notice' ORDER BY noticeid
SELECT noticeid, title, userid, createddate FROM notices WHERE category = 'event' ORDER BY noticeid
SELECT noticeid, title, userid, createddate FROM notices WHERE title LIKE #{keyword} AND category = 'notice' ORDER BY noticeid
SELECT noticeid, title, userid, createddate FROM notices WHERE title LIKE #{keyword} AND category = 'event' ORDER BY noticeid
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notices where category = 'notice'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notices where category = 'event'
SELECT noticeid, title, userid, createddate FROM notices WHERE category = 'notice' ORDER BY noticeid LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}
SELECT noticeid, title, userid, createddate FROM notices WHERE category = 'event' ORDER BY noticeid LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}
